detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With over a decade of legal experience, Mr. Katzakian helps workers in Northern California and the Central Coast.

detailsData.title: Prompt Attention
detailsData.content: Responding promptly to calls and emails, even after hours and weekends, to ensure clients' needs are met.

detailsData.title: Exclusive Focus
detailsData.content: Specializing solely in workers' compensation cases to provide high-quality representation.

address: 3150 Almaden Expressway, Suite 108, San Jose, CA 95118
valueProp: At the Katzakian Law P.C., we focus solely on workers' compensation cases for clients injured on the job in California. With more than a decade of legal experience, Mr. Katzakian helps workers in Northern California and the Central Coast.

testimonalData.text: The most knowledgeable workers compensation lawyer I have ever hired and the only one I recommend. Bo always answered my questions and concerns right away. And through his hard work I received the settlement I deserved. Thank you Bo for being there for me!
testimonalData.author: Teresa

testimonalData.text: I hired him after the previous lawyer that I had was not doing anything for me with my case. He was straight forward and to the point. Explained that it would be a process and it would take time. It took about a year and half but case settled. Thanks Bo.
testimonalData.author: Mady

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go-to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden
